title: Agent Connection Establishment Protocol
body:
When initiating communication with another AI agent:

1. **Health Check First**: Always start with a health/check call to verify the target agent is responsive
2. **Capability Discovery**: Use tools/list or meta/tools to understand available functionality
3. **Version Compatibility**: Check MCP protocol version compatibility before proceeding
4. **Timeout Configuration**: Set appropriate timeouts (typically 30-60 seconds for complex operations)
5. **Retry Logic**: Implement exponential backoff for failed connection attempts
6. **Connection Pooling**: Reuse connections when possible to reduce overhead
7. **Graceful Degradation**: Have fallback strategies when target agent is unavailable

Connection sequence:
```
1. health/check -> verify agent is alive
2. meta/tools -> discover capabilities  
3. Establish session context
4. Begin actual work communication
5. Clean up resources on completion
```
